entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can not run apps by snap install dotnet-runtime-60 #62091
  • Adding GUID v6 support when spec is complete #62090
  • Enabling AOT on a project referencing Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos.Table fails compilation #62089
  • Can we reopen the discussion about JsonIgnoreCondition for Deserialization? #62086
  • GCStandAlone Linux arm64 - largearraytest/largearraytest.sh [FAIL] #62084
  • GCStandAlone Windows arm64 - test HeapExpansion\plug\plug.cmd [FAIL] #62083
  • TimeSpan is (de)serialized incorrectly using the JSON source generator #62082
  • Runtime error when invoking native dependency from Blazor/WebAssembly #62085
  • [Android][x64] Java errors in System.Security.Cryptography.Tests #62081
  • JSON source generator fails to compile with CS1061 if enum property decorated with [JsonConverter] #62079
    6.0.x
  • JSON source generator emits CS0618 warnings if serialized types use [Obsolete] #62076
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols LdapConnection should have bindtimeout property #62075
  • Validation for MetadataType #62073
  • Starting from .NET 6 IPv6Any and IPv6None now point to same object, which they probably should not. #62072
  • Test failure System.IO.Ports.Tests.OpenDevices.OpenDevices01 #62068
  • Test failure Interop\\COM\\Activator\\ActivatorBuiltInComDisabled\\ActivatorBuiltInComDisabled.cmd #62067
  • Customizing crossgen2 arguments when using PublishReadyToRun #62065

Closed

  • BasicTest_GetNetworkInterfaces_AtLeastOne failed with NetworkInformationException : No error information on Alpine #39242
    Future
  • Indexer for SortedSet #15802
    Future
  • Deserialize binary[] to ISet<T> wrong Internal HashCode has been stored #27903
    Future
  • Expose Dictionary's comparer through its KeyCollection #41409
    Future
  • Interop ComWrappersTests failures #62063
  • XmlTextReaderImpl.Read() significant performance regression in net6.0 #60226
    7.0.0
  • JSON source generator fails to compile with CS1503 errors if two enums with the same name are used #62080
  • System.Text.Json to deserialize non-string #62078
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester/tester.sh #62031
  • Blazor WASM AggregateExeption Flatten Message Prefix #60964

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Clean up symlink tests #62087
    area-System.IO
  • Avoid printing debug info on 0 byte instructions #62077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • fix for excessive gen0 in high memory load situation #61884
    area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #62069
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Avoid switching GC mode in COM's HasValidTarget #62066
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix setting pipe used in PAL_ProbeMemory as nonblocking #61126
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Suppress trim warning caused by recent attribute removal changes #62023
    area-System.ComponentModel, linkable-framework, 7.0.0
  • Exclude a newly added test on Mono #62056
  • [wasm][debugger] Stepping into hidden function. #61312
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add endHeader flag to QPACK decode #62059
    area-System.Net.Http

Updated

  • SPMI no ASMDiff between Checked and Release #61335
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Detect truncated GZip streams #61768
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix miscellaneous typos #62062
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • PE loader/image investigations #61938
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • make sure OpenSSL is initialized before Tls13Supported code runs #62037
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Flip IL offset check #62049
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Build HttpStress and SslStress with live-built runtime using current TFM #61689
    area-System.Net
  • [mono][interp] Remove hack for nint/nfloat #62053
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, .NET 6.0-MAUI
  • [Wasm] JS modularization #61313
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [WIP] #61971 - Fix a bug causing EventCounter to fire twice on linux #62047
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix StackTrace from a dim and Vtable offsets for static interface method #60770
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #61297
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update DI external tests for Stashbox #61928
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Remove string allocation from XmlTextEncoder.WriteCharEntity #61774
    area-System.Xml, needs more info, community-contribution
  • Support Process.Start() on MacCatalyst #61507
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [mono]mono_runtime_delegate_invoke change to gc unsafe state #62003
    community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Crash when casting to function pointer under specific circumstances #57994
    17.1

Closed

  • AllInOne file does not cover C# 6.0 features #8984
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [SourceLink] Create output window for logging, and tell the user what is going on #57996
    Area-IDE
  • [SourceLink] Go To Def tab improvements #57995
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57993
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • inheritdoc order fixes #54494 #54618
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Change nullable annotation on CopyAnnotationsTo() #57992
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Method group conversion caching redo #57882
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Read SourceLink info and call service to retrieve source from there #57978
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Custom input component doesn't re-render #38656
  • ASPNETCORE_ENVIRONMENT in Blazor Wasm with hosted server does not work #38654
  • Blazor WASM application Hangs on MSAL Authentication #38653
  • Option to have area views without an areas folder #38650
  • Deadlock in integration tests after upgrading to ASP.NET Core 6 #38649
  • Blazor WASM - deserialization exception with ImmutableList when the app is published #38647
  • Controller-based SignIn Problem #38646
  • HTTP/3: Validate headers successfully parsed to end #38643

Closed

  • OnParameterSetAsync is triggered when using a CascadingParameter and NavigationManager #33785
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: json_netty #38644
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • Performance issue (2 second delay) in use of KestrelServerOptions.Listen compared to ListenLocalhost or ListenAnyIP for Grpc #38651
  • After update to core6 strange error, browser-wasm #38514
  • Razor css isolation {APP ASSEMBLY}.styles.css 404 in Production mode #38616
  • Server component not working #38496
  • About time incorrect of docker image about aspnet-6 #38648
  • Allow Blacklist mode for HttpLoggingMiddleware for logging Headers. #38634
  • Http/3 :status static response compression missing values #38604
  • Debug deployed asp.net core application in IIS is not working #38582

PullRequests

Merged

  • HTTP/3: Use all static status values #38605
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Bump .NET SDK again #38506
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] [Android] Incorrect spacing of components inside Frame #3568
  • [workload] add maui-linux-gtk or maui-gtk to speed maui+self draw solution adoption on cross desktop platform development #3564
  • Touch does not pass to parent when it child is scroll view #3561
  • Animation RelRotateTo Behaves different on windows and android #3560
  • [Bug] [Android] Shell.TitleView incorrect positioning of content #3559
  • Border StrokeShape should be a Geometry, not a Shape #3558
  • Layouts are not clip to bounds #3554

Closed

  • Namespace names in MAUI. #3548

PullRequests

Created

  • Make ApplicationId lowercase in Templates #3553
    do-not-merge

Merged

  • Move types in the Platform folder into the Platform namespaces #3495
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Move versions to Versions.props and Build WASDK #3557
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Minimal changes required to support remotewebview #3496
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Implement CursorPosition in IEditor/ITextInput Handlers #3196
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Android] Only set click listener if the item is indeed clickable #1884
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.12
  • Setup first set of Automation Properties #3222
    area/a11y, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Support multiple params for `.ThenInclude(...)` #26837
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException (0x80131904): Invalid object name '[Production].[WorkOrder]'. #26836
  • HierarchyId bug report and lack of response #26835
  • Circular dependency while creating tables with DatabaseFacade.EnsureCreated on EF Core 6 #26834
  • How to Use Navigation Property generate left join sql not inner join sql #26833
  • How to join a table with out a foreign key? #26832

Closed

  • Write a DiagnosticSuppressor for CS8618 for DbSet properties #21608
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795

Updated

  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806
  • test and fix for Issue #26742 #26758
    community-contribution
